description: Amendments to planning permission dated 14 September 2017 (RN: 17/05634) for the alterations and extensions to rear annexe building of The Mandeville Hotel comprising two storey infill extension at ground and mezzanine levels, two storey extension at the podium element, front and side extensions to tower element and a ninth floor roof extension to provide 38 additional bedrooms at upper floor levels (Class C1) and a flexible commercial unit (Use Class A1/A2/A3) at ground and mezzanine floor level.  Relocation of plant to podium and tower roof including variations to the approved drawing numbers for enlargement of refuse store, enlargement and relocation of cycle store, reconfiguration of laundry room and hotel fire exit and the addition of 2 x short-stay (Sheffield) cycle stands to provide 4 external visitor cycle spaces; NAMELY, to amend the layout of the hotel from basement to roof level to ensure consistency with associated applications 19/04732/FULL and 19/04733/LBC.
